Installation¶

  • This Explains how to manually install JumpScale in sandboxed mode
    • to make sure you remove previous version od
    • Install the sandbox
    • Update the jpackage metadata
    • install jumpscale documentation in a development env which is also master
  • This Explains how to manually install JumpScale on ubuntu & mint in development mode
    • to make sure you remove previous version
    • Install the latest trunk version from github
    • Get the jpackage metadata
    • Install the core jpackages
  • Install grid master on single node
  • How to install a grid in a modular way
    • components
    • Detailed Installation Instructions

Getting Started¶

  • IPython Tricks

  • Shell and Debugging
    • js
    • import jumpscale in any python script
    • from an existing python script start JumpScale & go to the debug shell
    • Alternative way of debugging ipdb h3.
  • Configuration Files
    • These are some configuration files that might be of use:
      • $jumpscaledir/cfg/jpackages/sources.cfg
      • $jumpscaledir/cfg/jsconfig/bitbucket.cfg
      • $jumpscaledir/cfg/jsconfig/blobstor.cfg
      • $jumpscaledir/apps/<portalapp>/cfg/portal.cfg
